original_text: They answered him, “If this man were not doing evil, we would not have delivered him over to you.”
korean_text: 대답하여 이르되 이 사람이 행악자가 아니었더라면 우리가 당신에게 넘기지 아니하였겠나이다

sentences.original_text: If this man were not doing evil,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 이 사람이 악을 행하지 않았다면,

sentences.original_text: we would not have delivered him over to you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 당신에게 그를 넘겨주지 않았을 것입니다.”
